nlacp: Based on the preferences and the reviewers' expertise, CyberChair calculates a paper assignment proposal for the chair, where as many as possible preferences of the reviewers are honored, provided that all papers are assigned to an equal number of reviewers (so also the papers that did not get any preferences), and all reviewers are assigned as much as possible an equal number of papers.

truth.subject: cyberchair
truth.condition: all papers are assigned to an equal number of reviewer

truth.subject: cyberchair
truth.condition: all reviewers are assigned as much as possible an equal number of paper

pred.subject: cyberchair
pred.condition: based on the preferences and the reviewers expertise
